Reference

Accessing data

Functions for accessing TAGS data.

read_tags()

Retrieve a TAGS archive of tweets and bring into R

pull_tweet_data()

Retrieve the fullest extent of tweet metadata available from the Twitter API

lookup_many_tweets()

Retrieve the fullest extent of tweet metadata for more than 90,000 tweets

Processing data

Functions related to processing data for subsequent analysis.

process_tweets()

Calculate additional information using tweet metadata

geocode_tags()

Retrieve geographic coordinates

get_char_tweet_ids()

Get tweet ID numbers as character strings

get_upstream_tweets()

Collect upstream tweets and add to dataset

get_url_domain()

Find the domain name of URLs, even shortened URLs

Social network analysis

Functions related to carrying out social network analysis.

add_users_data()

Retrieve user information for everyone in an edgelist

create_edgelist()

Create an edgelist with several types of interaction

create_mentions_edgelist()

Create an edgelist where interaction is defined by mentioning

create_quotes_edgelist()

Create an edgelist where interaction is defined by quote-tweeting

create_replies_edgelist()

Create an edgelist where interaction is defined by replying

create_retweets_edgelist()

Create an edgelist where interaction is defined by retweeting

geocode_tags()

Retrieve geographic coordinates

get_char_tweet_ids()

Get tweet ID numbers as character strings

get_upstream_tweets()

Collect upstream tweets and add to dataset

get_url_domain()

Find the domain name of URLs, even shortened URLs

lookup_many_tweets()

Retrieve the fullest extent of tweet metadata for more than 90,000 tweets

process_tweets()

Calculate additional information using tweet metadata

pull_tweet_data()

Retrieve the fullest extent of tweet metadata available from the Twitter API

read_tags()

Retrieve a TAGS archive of tweets and bring into R
